videos.title: I Am the Land — Visual Poem
videos.desc: A visual poem inspired by Mahmoud Darwish — voice, memory-made imagery, and AI cinematics.

videos.title: Generative Portraits — Motion Study
videos.desc: Short study in generative motion and portrait texture. Hand-crafted prompts + minimal cuts.

videos.title: Memory of Stones — Short Reel
videos.desc: Reel exploring stone, dust, and archival textures as living memory.

videos.title: City of Echoes — AI Music Cut
videos.desc: Music-driven visual cut; rhythms guide scenes through light and shadow.

videos.title: Eyes of Gaza — Microfilm
videos.desc: Microfilm sequence — glances, rubble, and resilience. Minimal text, strong imagery.

videos.title: Echoes of the Land — Song
videos.desc: A song from the heart of Palestine — traditional motifs blended with AI arrangement.

videos.title: Desert Birds — Visual Study
videos.desc: Minimal shots and grain — studying motion like birds over dunes.

videos.title: Olive Branch Dreams — Reel
videos.desc: Olive leaves, fabric patterns, and soft light — a reel about calm resistance.

videos.title: Dawn Over the Hills — Ambient Cut
videos.desc: Ambient visuals at first light — slow camera, long frames.

videos.title: Broken Frame — Experimental Edit
videos.desc: Experimental pacing and frame tearing — testing limits of AI motion.

videos.title: Sand & Light — Minimal Poetics
videos.desc: Minimal visual poetics: sand, wind, and soft light in quiet loops.
